DataElement.preferredName: Breast Cancer Treatment Outcomes Scale Cosmetic Status Breast Texture Difference Score Likert Scale Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of the current difference in breast texture between the treated and untreated breast since being treated for breast cancer, using a four point Likert scale value captured as a non-enumerated text field.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Breast Cancer Treatment Outcomes Scale Cosmetic Status Breast Texture Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A measure of perceived aesthetics after breast-conserving surgical treatment and radiotherapy._A person's stated observation of the difference in breast texture or hardening between the treated and untreated breast since treatment for breast cancer._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Property.preferredName: Breast Texture Difference Since Cancer Treatment Score

Concepts.longName: Breast Texture Difference Since Cancer Treatment
Concepts.definition: A question about the difference in an individual's breast texture or hardening between the treated and untreated breast since treatment for breast cancer.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
